channel.title: Is your server a"Leech" if you give credits to the creator?
channel.description:
Okay, i made this new server and everyone keeps saying "Leech noob!" And its pissin me off because i gave the source creators credit, and also i keep saying those were old pics, so is it leeching if i give credit?
NOT SURE THIS IS RIGHT CATEGORY

item.title: Is your server a"Leech" if you give credits to the creator?
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

It’s still considered a leech even if you give credits if you’ve changed just about nothing… Adding an npc here and there and changing the name doesn’t really make it yours. You need to add stuff, rewrite stuff and delete shit you don’t want

Read full topic
item.source: Is your server a"Leech" if you give credits to the creator?

item.title: Is your server a"Leech" if you give credits to the creator?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“tehlobbiescape, post:1, topic:276820”]Okay, i made this new server and everyone keeps saying “Leech noob!” And its pissin me off because i gave the source creators credit, and also i keep saying those were old pics, so is it leeching if i give credit?

NOT SURE THIS IS RIGHT CATEGORY[/quote]

But what’s the point of running a server you don’t edit? If you give 100% credits to the original source owner then… I guess… It wouldn’t be… ? Lol :\

Read full topic
item.source: Is your server a"Leech" if you give credits to the creator?

item.title: Is your server a"Leech" if you give credits to the creator?
item.dc:creator: @bbl111 bbl111
item.description:
@bbl111 wrote:

Well it would still be a leech, you just have to edit it a bit besides changing the name for it to become your own server. Then it wouldn’t be considered a leech.

Read full topic
